raw_content:
{
  "data": {
    "extracted_information": "Dokumentasi WEB API Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) menyediakan akses terprogram untuk membaca data BPS, termasuk Publikasi, Berita Rilis, Acara BPS, tabel statis dan dinamis. Akses API memerlukan token kunci yang bisa didapatkan dari API-Portal. Setiap pengguna bisa mendapatkan dua hingga tiga token kunci. Respons tersedia dalam format JSON.",
    "specifications": {
      "api_version": "v1",
      "base_url": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/",
      "access_method": "Programmatic access via key token",
      "response_format": "JSON",
      "key_token": {
        "description": "Key app to access API",
        "source": "API-Portal website"
      }
    },
    "pricing": {},
    "features": [
      "Akses ke data Publikasi",
      "Akses ke data Berita Rilis",
      "Akses ke data Acara BPS (tidak dirinci di konten ini)",
      "Akses ke tabel statis",
      "Akses ke tabel dinamis",
      "Akses ke data Sensus (via endpoint interoperabilitas)",
      "Akses ke data SIMDASI (via endpoint interoperabilitas)",
      "Akses ke data Foreign Trade (Export & Import)",
      "Akses ke data Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)",
      "Akses ke data Special Data Dissemination Standard (SDDS)",
      "Akses ke Klasifikasi Statistik (KBLI, KBKI)",
      "Fungsi pencarian konten website",
      "Fungsi Glosarium"
    ],
    "statistics": {
      "economic_statistics_endpoints": [
        {
          "name": "Dynamic Data - Data",
          "description": "Menampilkan data dari tabel dinamis berdasarkan variabel, turunan variabel, variabel vertikal, dan periode.",
          "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/list",
          "parameters": [
            {"field": "model", "type": "String", "description": "Model to display Data, use \"data\""},
            {"field": "lang", "type": "String", "description": "Language (ind/eng)", "optional": true, "default": "ind"},
            {"field": "domain", "type": "Number", "description": "Domain ID (e.g., 0000 for central)"},
            {"field": "var", "type": "Number", "description": "Variable ID selected (e.g., from List Variable, SDGs Table, or SDDS Table)"},
            {"field": "turvar", "type": "Number", "description": "Derived Variable ID selected", "optional": true},
            {"field": "vervar", "type": "Number", "description": "Vertical Variable ID selected", "optional": true},
            {"field": "th", "type": "Number", "description": "Period data ID selected (e.g., year)", "optional": true},
            {"field": "turth", "type": "Number", "description": "Derived Period Data ID selected", "optional": true},
            {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
          ],
          "success_response_fields": [
            {"field": "status", "type": "String"},
            {"field": "data-availability", "type": "String"},
            {"field": "var", "type": "Object[]", "description": "Variable details"},
            {"field": "turvar", "type": "Object[]", "description": "Derived variable details"},
            {"field": "labelvervar", "type": "Number", "description": "Title of vertical variable"},
            {"field": "vervar", "type": "Object[]", "description": "Vertical variable details"},
            {"field": "tahun", "type": "Object[]", "description": "Period data details"},
            {"field": "turtahun", "type": "Object[]", "description": "Derived period data details"},
            {"field": "metadata", "type": "Object"},
            {"field": "datacontent", "type": "Object", "description": "The actual data content"}
          ],
          "example_url": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/list/model/data/domain/0000/var/{id_var}/key/{your_api_key}/"
        },
         {
          "name": "Foreign Trade Data (Export & Import)",
          "description": "Menampilkan data perdagangan luar negeri (ekspor/impor).",
          "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/dataexim/",
          "parameters": [
            {"field": "sumber", "type": "Number", "description": "Source (1: Export, 2: Import)"},
            {"field": "periode", "type": "Number", "description": "Period (1: monthly, 2: annually)"},
            {"field": "kodehs", "type": "number", "description": "HS Code(s), use separator ';'. (e.g. firstHScode;secondHScode)"},
            {"field": "jenishs", "type": "Number", "description": "Type of HS Code (1: Two digit, 2: Full HS Code)"},
            {"field": "Tahun", "type": "String", "description": "Year of data"},
            {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
          ],
           "success_response_fields": [
            {"field": "status", "type": "String"},
            {"field": "data-availability", "type": "String"},
            {"field": "metadata", "type": "Object[]", "description": "Metadata about the data columns (source, value, netweight, kodehs, pod, ctr, year)"},
            {"field": "data", "type": "Object[]", "description": "Array of data objects"}
          ],
          "example_url": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/dataexim/sumber/{sumber}/periode/{periode}/kodehs/{kodehs}/jenishs/{jenishs}/Tahun/{tahun}/key/{your_api_key}/"
        }
      ],
      "sdds_indicators": [
        {"variable_en": "Wholesale Price Index (WPI) (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Indeks Harga Perdagangan Besar (IHPB) Indonesia (2018=100)", "model": "data", "id_var": 1721},
        {"variable_en": "Number and Percentage of Employment and Unemployment", "variable_id": "Jumlah dan Persentase Penduduk Bekerja dan Pengangguran", "model": "data", "id_var": 1953},
        {"variable_en": "Average of Net Wage/Salary", "variable_id": "Rata-Rata Upah/Gaji", "model": "data", "id_var": 1521},
        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Personal Care and Other Services Group and Sub (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 11 Perawatan Pribadi dan Jasa Lainnya", "model": "data", "id_var": 1904},
        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Provision of Food and Beverages / Restaurant Group and Sub (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 10 Penyediaan Makanan dan Minuman / Restoran", "model": "data", "id_var": 1903},
        {"variable_en": "Value of Export Oil&Gas - Non Oil&Gas", "variable_id": "Nilai Ekspor Migas-NonMigas", "model": "data", "id_var": 1753},
        {"variable_en": "[2010 Version] 3. Distribution of GDP at Current Market Prices by Expenditure", "variable_id": "[Seri 2010] 3. Distribusi PDB Triwulanan Atas Dasar Harga Berlaku menurut Pengeluaran", "model": "data", "id_var": 110},
        {"variable_en": "[2010 Version] 4. Growth Rate of GDP at Constant Market Prices By Expenditure", "variable_id": "[Seri 2010] 4. Laju Pertumbuhan PDB menurut Pengeluaran", "model": "data", "id_var": 108},
        {"variable_en": "Consumer Price Index of 90 City (General)", "variable_id": "Indeks Harga Konsumen 90 Kota (Umum)", "model": "data", "id_var": 1709},
        {"variable_en": "Consumer Price Index of Foods, Beverages and Tobacco Group and Sub (2022=100)", "variable_id": "Indeks Harga Konsumen (2022=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 01 Makanan, Minuman dan Tembakau", "model": "data", "id_var": 2212},
        {"variable_en": "Value of Import Oil&Gas - Non Oil&Gas", "variable_id": "Nilai Impor Migas-NonMigas", "model": "data", "id_var": 1754},
        {"variable_en": "GDP Implicit Growth by Industry (2010=100)", "variable_id": "[Seri 2010] Laju Implisit PDB Menurut Lapangan Usaha Seri 2010", "model": "data", "id_var": 105},
        {"variable_en": "Distribution of GDP at Current Market Prices by Industry (2010=100)", "variable_id": "[Seri 2010] Distribusi PDB Menurut Lapangan Usaha Seri 2010 Atas Dasar Harga Berlaku", "model": "data", "id_var": 106},
        {"variable_en": "Growth Rate of GDP by Industry (2010=100)", "variable_id": "[Seri 2010] Laju Pertumbuhan PDB Seri 2010", "model": "data", "id_var": 104},
        {"variable_en": "Consumer Price Index of Health Group and Sub (2022=100)", "variable_id": "Indeks Harga Konsumen (2022=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 05 Kesehatan", "model": "data", "id_var": 2216},
        {"variable_en": "Consumer Price Index of 38 Province (2022=100)", "variable_id": "Indeks Harga Konsumen 38 Provinsi (2022=100)", "model": "data", "id_var": 2261},
        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Food, Beverage and Tobacco Group and Sub (2018 = 100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 01 Makanan, Minuman dan Tembakau", "model": "data", "id_var": 1890},
        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Clothing and Footwear Group and Sub (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 02 Pakaian dan Alas Kaki", "model": "data", "id_var": 1894},
        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Housing, Water, Electricity and Household Fuel Group and Sub (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 03 Perumahan, Air, Listrik dan Bahan Bakar Rumah Tangga", "model": "data", "id_var": 1895},
        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Equipments and Routine Household Maintenance Group and Sub (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 04 Perlengkapan, Peralatan dan Pemeliharaan Rutin Rumah Tangga", "model": "data", "id_var": 1897},
        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Health Group and Sub (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 05 Kesehatan", "model": "data", "id_var": 1898},
        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Transportation Group and Sub (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 06 Transportasi", "model": "data", "id_var": 1899},

        {"variable_en": "Inflation by Recreation, Sports and Culture Group and Sub (2018=100)", "variable_id": "Inflasi (2018=100) Menurut Kelompok dan Sub Kelompok 08 Rekreasi, Olahraga dan Budaya", "model": "data", "id_var": 1901},

        {"variable_en": "Mid Year Population", "variable_id": "Jumlah Penduduk Pertengahan Tahun", "model": "data", "id_var": 1975},

        {"variable_en": "Import Price Index (2023=100)", "variable_id": "Indeks Harga Impor (2023=100)", "model": "data", "id_var": 2490}
      ],
       "sdgs_economic_indicators": [
        {"variable_en": "[2010 Version] Growth Rate of per Capita Gross Regional Domestic Product at 2010 Constant Market Prices", "variable_id": "[Seri 2010] Laju Pertumbuhan Produk Domestik Regional Bruto Per Kapita Atas Dasar Harga Konstan 2010", "id_var": 296},
        {"variable_en": "[2010 Version] Per Capita Gross Regional Domestic Product by Province", "variable_id": "[Seri 2010] Produk Domestik Regional Bruto Per Kapita", "id_var": 288},

        {"variable_en": "Average Working Hours Period by Age Group", "variable_id": "Upah Rata - Rata Per Jam Pekerja Menurut Kelompok Umur", "id_var": 1176},

        {"variable_en": "Average Working Hours Wage by Gender", "variable_id": "Upah Rata - Rata Per Jam Pekerja Menurut Jenis Kelamin", "id_var": 1174},

        {"variable_en": "Half Unemployment Rate by Age Group", "variable_id": "Tingkat Setengah Pengangguran Menurut Kelompok Umur", "id_var": 1185},
        {"variable_en": "Half Unemployment Rate by Area of Residence", "variable_id": "Tingkat Setengah Pengangguran Menurut Daerah Tempat Tinggal", "id_var": 1182},

        {"variable_en": "Half Unemployment Rate by Sex", "variable_id": "Tingkat Setengah Pengangguran Menurut Daerah Jenis Kelamin", "id_var": 1183},
        {"variable_en": "Number of foreign tourist visits per month to Indonesia according to the entrance, 2008 - 2017", "variable_id": "Jumlah Kunjungan Wisatawan Mancanegara per bulan ke Indonesia Menurut Pintu Masuk, 2008 - 2017", "id_var": 74},
        {"variable_en": "Number of foreign tourist visits per month to Indonesia according to the entrance, 2017 - now", "variable_id": "Jumlah Kunjungan Wisatawan Mancanegara per bulan ke Indonesia Menurut Pintu Masuk, 2017 - sekarang", "id_var": 1150},
        {"variable_en": "Number of Foreign Tourist Visits to Indonesia by Nationality, 2000-2014", "variable_id": "Jumlah Kunjungan Wisatawan Mancanegara ke Indonesia Menurut Kebangsaan, 2000-2014", "id_var": 351},
        {"variable_en": "Number of Foreign Tourist Visits to Indonesia by Nationality, 2015-now", "variable_id": "Jumlah Kunjungan Wisatawan Mancanegara ke Indonesia Menurut Kebangsaan", "id_var": 1821},
        {"variable_en": "Number of Nusantara Tourist Travels", "variable_id": "Jumlah Perjalanan Wisatawan Nusantara", "id_var": 1189},
        {"variable_en": "Percentage and number of working children aged 10-17 years by province", "variable_id": "Persentase dan jumlah anak usia 10-17 tahun yang bekerja menurut provinsi", "id_var": 2008},
        {"variable_en": "Percentage and number of working children aged 10-17 years by sex", "variable_id": "Persentase dan jumlah anak usia 10-17 tahun yang bekerja menurut jenis kelamin", "id_var": 2009},
        {"variable_en": "Percentage of Young Age (15-24 Years) Who Are Not School, Working Or Following Training", "variable_id": "Persentase Usia Muda (15-24 Tahun) Yang Sedang Tidak Sekolah, Bekerja Atau Mengikuti Pelatihan", "id_var": 1186},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Informal Employment in Total Employment by Age Group", "variable_id": "Proporsi Lapangan Kerja Informal Menurut Kelompok Umur", "id_var": 2156},

        {"variable_en": "Unemployment Rate by Sex", "variable_id": "Tingkat Pengangguran Terbuka Berdasarkan Jenis Kelamin", "id_var": 1177},
        {"variable_en": "Growth Rate of GDP Manufacturing Industry", "variable_id": "Laju Pertumbuhan PDB Industri Manufaktur", "id_var": 1216},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Added Value of Manufacture Sector To GDP", "variable_id": "Proporsi Nilai Tambah Sektor Industri Manufaktur Terhadap PDB", "id_var": 1214},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Added Value of Manufacturing Industry Sector per Capita", "variable_id": "Proporsi Nilai Tambah Sektor Industri Manufaktur per Kapita", "id_var": 1215},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Added Value of Small Industry to Total Value Added Industry", "variable_id": "Proporsi Nilai Tambah Industri Kecil Terhadap Total Nilai Tambah Industri", "id_var": 1219},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Government Research Budget to GDP", "variable_id": "Proporsi Anggaran Riset Pemerintah Terhadap PDB", "id_var": 1825},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Manpower in Manufacturing Industry Sector", "variable_id": "Proporsi Tenaga Kerja pada Sektor Industri Manufaktur", "id_var": 1217},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Small Industry With Loans Or Credit", "variable_id": "Proporsi Industri Kecil Dengan Pinjaman Atau Kredit", "id_var": 1220},
        {"variable_en": "Average Economic Growth In Disadvantaged Areas", "variable_id": "Rata-Rata Pertumbuhan Ekonomi Di Daerah Tertinggal", "id_var": 1237},
        {"variable_en": "Gini Ratio", "variable_id": "Gini Rasio", "id_var": 98},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of population living below 50 percent of median income, by province", "variable_id": "Proporsi penduduk yang hidup di bawah 50 persen dari median pendapatan, menurut provinsi", "id_var": 2011},
        {"variable_en": "Growth of Non Oil and Gas Product Exports", "variable_id": "Pertumbuhan Ekspor Produk Non Migas", "id_var": 1261},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Debt and Debt Service to Export of Goods and Services", "variable_id": "Proporsi Pembayaran Utang Dan Bunga (Debt Service) Terhadap Ekspor Barang Dan Jasa", "id_var": 1260},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Realization of Government Revenues to Gross Domestic Product", "variable_id": "Proporsi Realisasi Pendapatan Pemerintah Terhadap Produk Domestik Bruto", "id_var": 1588},
        {"variable_en": "Proportion of Remittance Volume (In US Dollars) To Total GDP", "variable_id": "Proporsi Volume Remitansi (Dalam US Dollars) Terhadap Total PDB", "id_var": 1258},
        {"variable_en": "Ratio of Tax Revenue to GDP", "variable_id": "Rasio Penerimaan Pajak Terhadap PDB", "id_var": 1529}
      ],
      "economic_data_access_note": "Data statistik ekonomi (termasuk harga, inflasi, PDB, dll) sebagian besar tersedia melalui endpoint Dynamic Data (`/v1/api/list` dengan parameter `model=data`) menggunakan ID variabel yang relevan. Daftar ID variabel untuk indikator utama dapat ditemukan di bagian SDDS dan SDGs dari dokumentasi API, dengan domain \"0000\" untuk data pusat. Data perdagangan luar negeri memiliki endpoint khusus (`/v1/api/dataexim/`)."
    },
    "temporal_info": {
      "data_updates": "SDGs Table List diupdate setiap tahun tanpa pemberitahuan sebelumnya.",
      "release_dates": "Press Release dan Publikasi memiliki tanggal rilis (`rl_date`) dan tanggal update (`updt_date`)."
    },
    "geographical_data": {
      "domains": "Data tersedia untuk domain pusat (`0000`), provinsi (`prov`), dan kota/kabupaten (`kab`/`kabbyprov`). Model 'Strategic Indicators' hanya untuk domain pusat dan provinsi.",
      "mfd_codes": "Sistem SIMDASI menggunakan 7 Digit MFD Code untuk wilayah (Provinsi, Kabupaten, Kecamatan)."
    },
    "references": [
      "API-Portal website (untuk mendapatkan key token)",
      "https://www.bps.go.id (Sumber data Foreign Trade)",
      "https://www.bi.go.id/id/statistik/sdds/Default.aspx (Informasi lebih lanjut tentang SDDS)",
      "https://www.bps.go.id/assets/docs/HSCode%20Master%20BPS.pdf (Master HS Code)",
      "https://www.bps.go.id/klasifikasi (Informasi lebih lanjut tentang Klasifikasi Statistik KBLI/KBKI)"
    ],
    "endpoints": [
      {
        "name": "Domain",
        "description": "Menampilkan semua website domain BPS Statistik.",
        "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/domain",
        "parameters": [
          {"field": "type", "type": "String", "description": "Type of domain (all, prov, kab, kabbyprov)", "allowed_values": ["all", "prov", "kab", "kabbyprov"]},
          {"field": "prov", "type": "String", "description": "Prov ID (required for type 'kabbyprov')", "optional": true, "size_range": "4"},
          {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
        ],
        "success_response_fields": [
          {"field": "status", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data-availability", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data", "type": "Object[]", "description": "[{page info}, {list of domains}]"},
          {"field": "domain_id", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "domain_name", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "domain_url", "type": "String"}
        ]
      },
       {
        "name": "Subject - List of All Subject",
        "description": "Menampilkan semua data subjek di website.",
        "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/list/",
        "parameters": [
          {"field": "model", "type": "String", "description": "Model to display Subject Data, use \"subject\""},
          {"field": "lang", "type": "String", "description": "Language (ind/eng)", "optional": true, "default": "ind"},
          {"field": "domain", "type": "Number", "description": "Domain ID"},
          {"field": "subcat", "type": "Number", "description": "Subject category ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "page", "type": "Number", "description": "Page number", "optional": true},
          {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
        ],
        "success_response_fields": [
          {"field": "status", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data-availability", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data", "type": "Object[]", "description": "[{page info}, {list of subjects}]"},
          {"field": "sub_id", "type": "Number"},
          {"field": "title", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "subcat_id", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "subcat", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "ntabel", "type": "Number"}
        ]
      },
       {
        "name": "Subject Categories - List of All Subject Categories",
        "description": "Menampilkan semua kategori data subjek di website.",
        "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/list/",
        "parameters": [
          {"field": "model", "type": "String", "description": "Model to display Subject Categories, use \"subcat\""},
          {"field": "lang", "type": "String", "description": "Language (ind/eng)", "optional": true, "default": "ind"},
          {"field": "domain", "type": "Number", "description": "Domain ID", "size_range": "4"},
          {"field": "page", "type": "Number", "description": "Page number", "optional": true},
          {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
        ],
         "success_response_fields": [
          {"field": "status", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data-availability", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data", "type": "Object[]", "description": "[{page info}, {list of subject categories}]"},
          {"field": "subcat_id", "type": "Number"},
          {"field": "title", "type": "String"}
        ]
      },
      {
        "name": "Dynamic Data - Data",
        "description": "Menampilkan data dari tabel dinamis di website.",
        "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/list",
        "parameters": [
          {"field": "model", "type": "String", "description": "Model to display Data, use \"data\""},
          {"field": "lang", "type": "String", "description": "Language (ind/eng)", "optional": true, "allowed_values": ["ind", "eng"], "default": "ind"},
          {"field": "domain", "type": "Number", "description": "Domain ID"},
          {"field": "var", "type": "Number", "description": "Variable ID"},
          {"field": "turvar", "type": "Number", "description": "Derived Variable ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "vervar", "type": "Number", "description": "Vertical Variable ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "th", "type": "Number", "description": "Period data ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "turth", "type": "Number", "description": "Derived Period Data ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
        ],
         "success_response_fields": [
            {"field": "status", "type": "String"},
            {"field": "data-availability", "type": "String"},
            {"field": "var", "type": "Object[]"},
            {"field": "turvar", "type": "Object[]"},
            {"field": "labelvervar", "type": "Number"},
            {"field": "vervar", "type": "Object[]"},
            {"field": "tahun", "type": "Object[]"},
            {"field": "turtahun", "type": "Object[]"},
            {"field": "metadata", "type": "Object"},
            {"field": "datacontent", "type": "Object"}
          ]
      },
       {
        "name": "Dynamic Data - List Derived Period Data",
        "description": "Menampilkan semua turunan data periode pada tabel dinamis.",
        "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/list",
        "parameters": [
          {"field": "model", "type": "String", "description": "Model to display derived period data, use \"turth\""},
          {"field": "lang", "type": "String", "description": "Language (ind/eng)", "optional": true, "default": "ind"},
          {"field": "domain", "type": "Number", "description": "Domain ID", "size_range": "4"},
          {"field": "var", "type": "Number", "description": "Variable ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "page", "type": "Number", "description": "Page number", "optional": true},
          {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
        ],
         "success_response_fields": [
          {"field": "status", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data-availability", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data", "type": "Object[]", "description": "[{page info}, {list of derived period data}]"},
          {"field": "turth_id", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "turth", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "group_turth_id", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "name_group_turth", "type": "String"}
        ]
      },
       {
        "name": "Dynamic Data - List Derived Variable",
        "description": "Menampilkan semua turunan variabel pada tabel dinamis.",
        "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/list",
        "parameters": [
          {"field": "model", "type": "String", "description": "Model to display derived variable, use \"turvar\""},
          {"field": "lang", "type": "String", "description": "Language (ind/eng)", "optional": true, "default": "ind"},
          {"field": "domain", "type": "Number", "description": "Domain ID", "size_range": "4"},
          {"field": "var", "type": "Number", "description": "Variable ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "group", "type": "Number", "description": "Group Vertical Variable ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "nopage", "type": "Boolean", "description": "Show without pagination (1 for no pagination)", "optional": true, "allowed_values": [0, 1]},
          {"field": "page", "type": "Number", "description": "Page number", "optional": true},
          {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
        ],
         "success_response_fields": [
          {"field": "status", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data-availability", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "data", "type": "Object[]", "description": "[{page info}, {list of derived variables}]"},
          {"field": "turvar_id", "type": "Number"},
          {"field": "turvar", "type": "String"},
          {"field": "group_turvar_id", "type": "Number"},
          {"field": "name_group_turvar", "type": "String"}
        ]
      },
       {
        "name": "Dynamic Data - List Period Data",
        "description": "Menampilkan semua data periode pada tabel dinamis.",
        "endpoint": "https://webapi.bps.go.id/v1/api/list",
        "parameters": [
          {"field": "model", "type": "String", "description": "Model to display period data, use \"th\""},
          {"field": "lang", "type": "String", "description": "Language (ind/eng)", "optional": true, "default": "ind"},
          {"field": "domain", "type": "Number", "description": "Domain ID", "size_range": "4"},
          {"field": "var", "type": "Number", "description": "Variable ID", "optional": true},
          {"field": "page", "type": "Number", "description": "Page number", "optional": true},
          {"field": "key", "type": "String", "description": "Your API Key"}
        ],
